input.text: Start your Virtual Machine. Select Try or Install Ubuntu. Wait for the installer to pop up and select your preferred language. Check, Install Ubuntu. Select your Keyboard Layout. Select your Network. Select Minimal Installation. Select Erase disk and install Ubuntu. Click Install. Select your Timezone. Provide your Username and Password. Select your Theme. Now, wait while Ubuntu is being installed onto your system. Finally click Restart now. Edit your VM's Hardware settings, and select Do not use any media on your CD-ROM drive. Press Enter to complete the Reboot process.
